attributes.action: Support the lottery for a new Britannia Royal Yacht
attributes.background: To promote the United Kingdom on the World stage follwing the Brexit decision

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what kind of support you'd like the Government to give to this proposal. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
